meanings.definition: Resembling or pertaining to pitch or tar.
meanings.sent1: The piceous substance on the road made it sticky.
meanings.sent2: The piceous roof shingles glistened in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The piceous paint on the fence smelled like tar.
meanings.sent4: Her piceous hair was as dark as a moonless night.
meanings.sent5: The piceous liquid oozed slowly from the container.

meanings.sent1: The piceous cat blended into the night effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The piceous sky was filled with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent3: The piceous dress made her look like a mysterious shadow.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were piceous pools of depth and mystery.
meanings.sent5: The piceous clouds loomed ominously overhead.
